name: Maxie's Hidden Ball Trick
text: You can play this card only when it is the last card in your hand. Put a Fighting Pokémon from your discard pile onto your Bench. Then, draw 5 cards.

name: Champions Festival
text: Once during each player's turn, if that player has 6 Pokémon in play, he or she may heal 10 damage from each of his or her Pokémon.

attacks.name: Present
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Icy Wind
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
